case.state: How's it going? The name's Joetta, but you can call me "Joey!"
Joetta Emiliana Grimaldi, officially licensed party clown, at your service!
Howdy! I'm Joey! Joey the Joey! Haha, get it? 'Cause clowns are also called "Joeys," and my name is Joey!
The name's Joetta, but I also answer to Joey, Jo, Jojo, Cup'o Jo, Joestar, Jo Mama, and Jeg. See if you can figure out that last one!
Joetta Emiliana Grimaldi: clown, magician, and burlesque dancer, at your service!
Pick me! Pick me!... Oh hey, ya picked me! Woohoo!
Don't worry, ~player~, I'm not offended by this table selection! You're just lookin' to laugh, aren'tcha?
Sorry, ~player~, I don't do meta jokes. I got nothin' for ya.
No meta jokes here. Nope. None. Sorry.
Is this memes?...
Is this memes?... Am I memes?... Are you memes?...
Oh, Lonato, I think I know that one. That's that magic sword that lets you see the future, right? Yeah, we gotta stop that rebel!
Hiya, Ini! My name's Joetta, but you can call me "Joey."
Haha! I knew this game would involve playing with myself, but -- darn! I beat myself to it!
Ooh, are you streaming this right now? Hi, internet!
"Wonder Clown," huh? That's not me, but I like the sound of that...
Nope! I'm not evil! At least, I don't think I am...
Hmmm, nope, can't say I've heard of a "Rib Tickler." Not as a person, anyway!
I know, right? Stupid evil clowns, ruining a fun thing for people, all for some silly juxtaposition -- or worse, to specifically prey on people's pre-existing discomfort! To shame!
I see why he's here, ~player~, ya thirsty devil! You sure do love your punch, huh?
Haha! I'm pretty sure I'd get arrested if I performed on the street!
Nice to meet'cha too, Twilight. Someone said you're a horse? They did say horse and not some other, more insulting word, right?
Hi, everyone! I'm Joey, and this mime here is my friend Monique! We met in school!... High school. Not clown college.
You'd be surprised, Sayaka. Sexy clowns are pretty rare, so the demand can be pretty high!
There's a circus here? Where?
Haha! I knew this game would involve playing with myself, but I didn't know it'd be like this!
Hmm. Would more than one of me be ~player~'s dream or nightmare?
Oh my! Is that really what I look like? Weird!
Oh, I'm already here? That's cool. Guess I'll just... uh... sweep?...
Close. I'm Ms. Joetta Grimaldi, at your service! And I didn't bring any balloons today!
That's great, Ms. Blue Face! I can't say I understand coulrophobia, but it sure is nice when people don't have it!
Hey! You're not BlueKoin! The real BlueKoin is seven feet tall and has a big, bushy mustache!
Hey! You're not BlueKoin! The real BlueKoin is four-foot-three and has a bright green mohawk!
Hey! You're not BlueKoin! The real BlueKoin has big, bushy eyebrows and always walks into rooms backwards!
Hey! You're not BlueKoin! The real BlueKoin always wears a red cap and a blue 'n yellow striped shirt!
Boy, I hope no one plays "Pop Goes the Weasel!"
Another clown? I didn't realize I was joining a birthday party!
No guys today, huh? That's okay, I perform for any and all crowds!
No guys today, huh? Well, you know what they say: "The show must go on."
No guys today, huh? That's okay, I don't mind at all!
Just us ladies, huh? Dibs on ~player~, then! Hahaha!
No guys today? Don't worry, I've had tons of girlfriends in my life!... Er, wait, sorry, that's "friends who are girls."
Fair warning, fellas; I'm a good escape artist, so leave the funny business to me, 'kay?
How's it goin'? The name's Joetta, but you can call me "Joey!"
Joetta Emiliana Grimaldi, officially licensed party clown, at your service!
Howdy! I'm Joey! Joey the Joey! Haha, get it? 'Cause clowns are also called "Joeys," and my name is Joey!

state.text: The name's Joetta, but I also answer to Joey, Jo, Jojo, Cup'o Jo, Joestar, Jo Mama, and Jeg. See if you can figure out that last one!

case.state: Joetta Emiliana Grimaldi: clown, magician, and burlesque dancer, at your service!
Hi, I'm Joey, and I'll warn ya now, the makeup is gonna stay on. No promises about my pants, though!
Hiya! Thanks for not running away at the sight of a clown! My name's Joey!
My name's Joey, and I'm here to show ya just how sexy clowns can be!
Hey, ~player~, when the match is over, wanna see me get the high score in Expert Man 2?
Hey, ~player~, ever been skinny dipping in the ocean? Me neither, but today's a great time to change that!
Win or lose, I'm totally gonna go skinny dipping in the ocean when we're done!
Y'know, I don't take many trips to the beach. I should try to change that!
Ah, what better place to take off your pants than here!
Huh. This feels like the set-up to some kinda joke. "A clown walks in to a library..."
As much as I enjoy romance, even I gotta admit this room's pretty tacky. Sorry, ~player~.
Ooh, this is a great place for strip poker! The fresh air's gonna feel great on our bare skin!
Happy... er, whatever today is!
Is today a holiday, or is it just ~weekday~?
I'm used to crowds, but I dunno if here's a good place for this game. I don't want anyone getting hit by a car!
I think this is taking "let's get the show on the road" a bit too literally!
We're really gonna do this here? I would've figured I'd get arrested if I performed in public...
Hey, do we have a permit to do this or something? Pretty sure we're gonna go to jail otherwise...
Can't say I'm a stranger to performing in offices... What? I do motivational work!
Interesting place for strip poker game. So do one of you guys work here, or...?
Ah, you guys caught me working late at the office... Just kidding! Can you imagine? Me, working in an office?
Y'know, you might be surprised at how often I get hired to work at office parties!
Here I am to brighten up your gloomy office evening!... Wait a minute, there's no way any of you work here!
I'm probably the exact kind of clown you want to run into in an alley.
Don't worry, I'm not the kind of clown you don't want to run into in an alley, I'm the other kind!
Y'know, if I were a different kind of gal, this would be exactly where you'd usually find me. But not for that reason, for the other one.
No cards, thanks!
Everything's good over here! No cards needed!
Just one, please!
One should work... Yeah, yeah, one should work.
I need two... No wait, three... No no wait, two... Wait, no, definitely just one.
I need new cards like I need to put my pants back on -- which is to say, I'd rather not!
Golly! This ain't good at all! Let's see if I can fix that!
Okay, well, this ain't great, but at least I can swap it away and try again!
Can ya spare ~cards.text~ cards?
I need ~cards.text~.
~cards.text~ new cards, please!
I need one card for every different way a clown has ever painted their face... Or if ya don't know that one, ~cards.text~ will do!
Wait, which one of us was dealing the cards, again? Whoever it was, can ya give me ~cards.text~, please?
How many cards I need depends on how much ya wanna see me naked. If ya want me to keep my clothes on, ya need to give me ~cards.text~. If ya want a naked clown, I'll just keep this hand as it is.
Sorry, but you've lost this round for sure!
Sorry, but unless ya also got a royal flush, you've lost this round!
This hand is the best -- literally!
I always forget, is this the best possible hand, or is it the other one...?
I've got two pairs and a banana. Anyone wanna trade for a watermelon?
I've got two pairs and a banana. Golly, what a lot of fruit!
Sorry, but there's no way you're winning this round.
Better start hoping for a tie, 'cause otherwise you've probably lost.
I guess these cards don't want me to have any look saucier than a "just came home" look.
We're quite a ways away from clown boobs, and with a hand like this, they're not getting any closer!
No complaints over here!
My poker face is bad, but my hand sure ain't!
Alright! Woohoo! These cards rule!
Yay, a solid hand! I love not doing the thing I came here to do!
At least when I'm without a shirt, no one can accuse me of cheating!
Ha! The dealer must be a fan of bras! Giving me good cards to keep me in it!
Hope you all like the topless look, 'cause I'll be staying like this for this round!
Y'know, I think I look great like this, and the cards seem to agree!
Yes! I get to stay dressed exactly as I am! Don'tcha love when that happens?
I promise this good hand has nothing to do with my sleight of hand abilities! The only sleight of hand I'll be doing here is... Um... There's an innuendo in there somewhere...
A banana and good cards?! I've got it all!
Aw man! Best round ever!
Everything's perfect with me right now!
This round couldn't be better!
Nothing beats getting good poker hands while eating a banana!
I hope you guys are doing as good as I am right now!
I'll be honest: I don't actually want this good hand. I'd rather not stay bottomless long.
I'd actually rather lose this hand, but oh well! Can't complain about good cards!
Drat! For once, I actually want to lose, but nope, the cards won't let me!
Who would've thought cards love bottomless clowns? Apparently they do! Assuming cards can think for themselves, anyway!
Maybe I got luckier when I got bottomless? Maybe I should go bottomless more often and see if my luck goes up?
Say, what if my panties were unlucky panties? Y'know how people have lucky items? What if my panties are the opposite of that?
I'm not competitive enough to wanna win, but I am naked enough to enjoy not losing!
Well, if it wasn't obvious before that I'm not cheating, it should be now! I have no place to hide cards!
Looks like your pay off took the day off, ~player~. I can't lose this round!
Sweat sassy gravy lumps! Just what I needed to stay in another round!
Oh good, looks like I get to enjoy just being naked for another round.
I'm so happy to see this hand that I could do something that might very likely result in a painful paper cut!
Hmm. You could have this, but so could I...
Gosh, when it's just us two, this hand doesn't mean much!
I'm probably lost, but that's okay. I don't mind losing a few more times.
Hope you all liked my panty trick! It took me a while to get it to work.
Hope you all liked my panty trick! It took hours of Photoshop-- I mean hours of practice!
Man, you would not believe the skullduggery it took to get my panty trick to work!
Ooh! These cards are keeping my fate a surprise! I love surprises!
At this rate, I may as well flip a coin! Perhaps one made out of some sort of sapphire-tinted alloy...
Eh. Comme ci, comme ça. Pardon my French.
Eh. These'll do. Probably...
Well, this hand doesn't need to be the best, just not the worst -- just like jokes! A small laugh is better than no laugh at all!
Not gonna lie, these... these aren't great.
Don't expect me to slip on the banana peel, by the way. That's too cliché to be funny.
This hand leaves more to the imagination than my state of dress does!
If I lose this hand, I'll eat my hat!... It's made of candy, y'know!
Man, these cards aren't helping how awkward I feel being bottomless! I've always been a "top first" kind of gal!
I hope you're rooting for me to lose this hand, 'cause I sure am!
Gotta admit, I hope I'll lose this hand. Being fully nude is a lot nicer than being bottomless!
Gosh, I'm really feeling the heat right now!... Whoa, ~player~! I didn't mean that kind of heat!
I could be safe, or I could lose. Not knowing which will happen is killing me!
Eh, I'm probably safe... probably.
Pair-haps I'll be out, pair-haps I'll be safe for another round. Who knows?
I can't even complain if I lose. What do I look like, some kinda weirdo who thinks winning at strip poker is a big deal?
Eh. The cards could be better, but I'm certainly in no position to complain!
Hurray! Mediocrity!
Eh. Pair's pair.
Hmm, a pair and a banana. I wonder how well pears and bananas taste together...
This hand is all splorfy. I need it to be more wazzle, y'know what I mean?
Y'know, I never was that great at poker. Frankly, I dunno how I've lasted this long!
I do wish clowns could get a lil' more respect from people. We bend over backwards to make people laugh -- sometimes literally!
Welp, guess I should get to stripping.
Pretty sure I've lost this round, but that's okay. I can stand to lose.
Golly, I'm getting awful close to losing, and this hand isn't helping any.
Congratulations on your victory.
Ha! Dealer, you're such a goober!
Welp, I'm pretty sure I lost this round!
Well, if this were a reversal round, I'd win! Too bad it's not opposite day!
Haha! That dealer! Such a dinkoid!
I've been smeckledorfed! Absolutely bamboozled out of a passable hand! The skullduggery of it all!
Anyone wanna trade hands? No? Didn't think so!
I can't even complain about this hand. I take my clothes off as a hobby!
Welp, unless you have a lower high card than mine, I've definitely lost. That's fine. No, really.
Gosh, with cards like these, I'd be shaking in my boots - if I still had them!
Welp, looks like I'm gonna lose my pants soon, which I'm super okay with!
Ever want to see a clown in her underwear? Looks like your chance is coming up soon!
Ooh! Looks like I get to take off my pants soon! Finally!
Looks like it's time to kiss my pants goodbye!
Welp, if I don't lose my pants this round, I'll win by the seat of them!
Ha! Cards like these can't keep me down when I got a banana to eat!
Ha! Silly cards! Can't bring me down this round!
Ha! I think the deck is jealous of my banana!
Ah good, nothing goes better with a banana than a high card!
Aw c'mon, cards, at least let me finish my banana!
I guess it's only fair that I show you my melons after whipping out my banana.
Aw, crud muffins!... Oh darn, a muffin would be great right about now!
Yes! A bad hand! Now I can get out of the awkward position I put myself in!
Looks like it's time to ditch my bra! Being bottomless is not my thing!
If anyone's got anything worse than what I've got, I'll trade ya!
Yes! I lose! I lose!... Well, we don't know that yet, but I probably lost!
I sure hope my panties weren't lucky panties...
Oh good, looks like it's full-nude time for me!
Methinks the dealer wants to get bopped with a squeaky hammer... Not that I have one...
What? "Hit the dealer?" No! I wasn't about to hit the dealer! What are you talking about?
What'd ya say, dealer? "Hit me?" We're the ones who're supposed to say that! But if you insist...
Welp, I'm about as boned as a chicken wing right now!
Aw, flippy whip whippy. These cards bite worse than a t-rex stealing your burrito!
This is not a position I'd like to be in. I'd much rather be running the Carpet Clown position right now -- that's where ya entertain folks between circus acts!
I'd ask for a mulligan, but my hand isn't either entirely land or devoid of land!... I bet ~player~ gets it!
I'm metaphorically boned. And then I'll be literally boned!
Oh, looks like it's time to be fake mad about my hand. Golly gosh darn, my luck is so bad! I don't wanna lose!
Darn, I knew I should've taken that statistics class. Thought the odds I'd ever need it were low...
Golly, look at all these hats. It's like we're having some kind of "nice hat party" or something!
Well, that is one thing that could be "spilled" around here!
Doesn't look like there is anywhere to hide -- and before anyone asks, no, I can't make you disappear with magic. I never was good at doing that trick on people!
It's okay, Mahiru, I'm only poking fun! Aella's a big girl, she can take it!
You'd be surprised how bulky the average shoe is, Mia. Compare Nikes to Pumas and you'll see what I mean.
Oh, you'd be surprised at just how much bulk the average shoe has, Mia! There's a lot you could do to make them smaller!
You ever see The Three Stooges, Mahiru? Moe is basically a white clown, Curly is a red clown, and Larry is a contre-auguste. This isn't exactly true, but it's a pretty close example!
Oh, golly, I seem to be at an impasse between your two ideals here. You both pose convincing arguments...
Huh. I've never tried that. I don't think it'd work with me, though, I'd just end up getting the food whether I met my goal or not!
It is appealing. Thank you for sharing!
There were invitations...?
I thought so too, but then I double-checked it and realized that's not what it said at all, and there were in fact no words on it that could be mistaken for such!
Don'tcha just hate when that happens? I've done that a ton!
That's not what people usually do, but that could achieve the same goal.
Whoa! Flowers! That's a neat trick!
I know I'm one to talk here, but that's a really bizarre getup for a magician.
So how come you don't wear a mask? Do you just go around expecting the lighting to always give you that face shadow, or do you not hide your identity?
I'd ask if you're gonna take off your headband, but that'd probably leave a big ol' hole in your head, huh?
Nice to meet'cha, Pinkie! My name's Joetta, but you can call me "Joey."
Hey, that's not nice! I'm not a dog!
I think I know why. You probably work with a bunch of one-handed people! They called me "Hand J" in Clown College.
Aw man, of all the clown slang you know, you forget the one that's actually my name!
Yep! Mine would be my nose!... My real nose, not the clown nose.
Oh, what a cute squirrel! Hi, Paska! Don't worry, I'm great with animals -- except bats. Bats don't like me...
Hmmm. Me? Know any jokes? I mean, I might. Maybe just a couple. I dunno. It sure is a possibility.
No offense, but I think I make more sense being here than an armored warrior.
Hiya, Revy. My name's Joetta, but you can call me "Joey."
Golly, I'm all confused now! Which one's the traditional one again?...
Oh, uh, do you have more of those shirts...?
Oh, uh, did you bring any more shirts, or...?
Not at all! You have a nice rear!
Sorry, Kyu, I didn't mean to make that sound like a bad thing. I'm just poking fun!
Hey, I never said it was a bad thing. I'm just poking fun! Didn't mean to strike a nerve!
I have, but I don't like to compete. I prefer to just have fun doing my own thing - no innuendo intended!
I'm not sure... I can't exactly see it myself.
Well, uh... maybe? I've never seen it, though!
Yeah, the consensus on the decency of exposed spats is bizarrely ambiguous. If you ask me, they're no different than yoga pants, so they're fine on their own.
And here I thought I'd be the one dishing out the surprises at this match.
Nah, I guess naked hugs aren't really a common thing. Want one anyway? I bet it'd be pretty nice!
~blank~
I sure do! The audience is one, in a way, but people write reviews for my shows too. I don't pay much attention to them, though, 'cause it's really the crowd that matters!
Now that you mention it, yeah, I'm getting pretty hungry for spaghetti. Is that what your patrons normally go eat afterward?
I don't have to wish -- my brother was all i could ever ask for!
You have a lovely body, Aella! All you need to do to be sexy is just act natural, and be yourself!
Like a dungeon dungeon? Closest thing to that I got was one time I did some escape magic at a BDSM dungeon.
I could eat, yeah!
I have, actually! There was this one that keep shouting "Ricky!" It was kind of distracting, honestly...
Aw man, I think I'm gonna need a real toilet! Haha!... Urp!
Hey Aella, you ever have a naked hug before?
Haha! Must'a been an auguste and a contre-auguste!
Haha! Sounds like the Boss Clown wasn't there to make sure the joke went as planned!
You sure you want that now and not once my pants are off?

I can't help but feel you're missing the bigger picture, Miss Pauling. I'm sure there are more exciting powers you could have that would also make you not fear getting shot -- like being able to turn into a ghost!
Mine's the "Eiffel tower," but only because it's a funny name and even funnier to try to explain to people what it is!
Yeah, I go by lots of nicknames, Jolyne! I go by so many that sometimes someone says a name and I'm like "Who? Me?"
Aw, no need to worry, big guy, that's just what some people call me - no idea why.
Whoa. Anyone else get chills just now? Something feels... funky right now.
I play baseball, believe it or not. Sometimes with clothes, sometimes without!
Hmm. That's a tough question... I'm pretty good at Mario Kart, I guess, but I dunno if I'd win any competitions in it... What else am I good at...?
Aw, that could be anything, Rainbow Dash! That's not a whole lot to go off of.
Huh, I didn't think about time spent nude as a baby. Let's say that doesn't count. Babies aren't exactly expected to wear clothes.
A blindfold, huh? Isn't it a little too early to start getting kinky?
Ooh! Alice, I love your... well, everything! Purple is my favorite color!
I just remembered: I met a girl named Alice in Clown College, and she had purple hair too! Funny thing, eh?
You're a hologram, huh, Alpha? You look heavier than a gram to me!
Wow! There's more Corrin here than a maize field!
Sure thing, Elizabeth!
Y'know, HK416, I knew an HK-206 in clown college. Any chance you two know each other?
Ooh, I like the bunny ears you have, Jenetta! I have a nice pair of my own that I wear for Easter performances.
That's not how that joke goes, silly!
Whoa, cool shades! Where can I get a pair? They'd be right at home as part of my clown outfit!
Did anyone hear about the coin with no sides? It's a really puzzling thing; I can't make heads or tails of it!
Did you hear about the guy that got to know the 25th letter of the alphabet? I asked him what he did it for, and he said he didn't know Y!
Curious about what my outfit's made of? Why, only the finest polyjester, of course!
What do you call it when your pickaxe's handle breaks? A miner inconvenience!
Hey, yeah, ~player~ does look like a clown! I mean, look at that outfit! What, did'ja pick that out of the lost 'n found or something?
Hey, yeah, ~player~ does look like a clown! I mean, look at that outfit! It's like ya got your outfit from a set of preselected garments!
That's a nice hat ya got there, Zizou. Know any good hat tricks?
Of course I'm eating it! Who am I to turn down a free banana?
Of course I'm eating it! Why else would I have brought it?
Of course I'm eating it! I'm hungry!
I think my joke went over you're head there, Kamina. Thanks for the offer, though!
Whoa! You're a hologram? That's so cool!... I'm not even building up to a joke or anything, that's just really cool!
You might be delighted to know that Monique's grandfather is Jacques Lecoq, founder of École internationale de théâtre Jacques Lecoq!... You know what that is, right...?
Oh, if you were wondering, Monique doesn't do any burlesque with me. I keep telling her she'd enjoy it, though!
Gee, I'm really killing you with the jokes, huh, Chara?
How about this one: what's green and has wheels? Grass, I lied about the wheels!
I'm an Earth Clown, but I prefer the term "Party Clown."
Haha... Banana milk... Sounds like an innuendo.
Yeah, but that's what immune systems are for, right?
I hope I didn't disappoint you with my banana, Mia. I'm sure you're used to people throwing their toupées and ripping off their faces to reveal they're you and stuff like that!
Nah, I shaved before the trick, Futaba. It's easier than dying it and looks better than not having the carpet match the drapes.
Oh, stripping isn't a clown thing, Jura, it's a burlesque thing. That's my whole schtick: the stripping clown!
Golly, Meia, you sure are a tough nut to crack. There's gotta be something that'll make you laugh...
Sorry, Revy, I don't take requests. The jokes lose their impact if you can see them coming!
Oh well, I know when to admit defeat. I just can't make ya laugh, Meia.
Well no, but toilet seats don't taste as good as a banana does!
Well no, but toilet seats are not nearly as convenient as a banana, 'cause I'd have to trek all the way over to the bathroom, as opposed to just reaching into my pants!
Your banana? Then where'd my banana go?
Wait, if this is your banana, what's it doing in my pants?
What? You haven't heard of either of them? That's weirder than me liking them!
Dang, Galatea, I think you've got us all beat! A whole year naked would probably get anyone else arrested!
Oh yeah, definitely! But sometimes critics are just critics, y'know? It's good to meditate on what they say, but at the end of the day, you don't have to listen to them!
Well, not really, but you can put cheese on spaghetti, and I think a lot of people have wine with it too. Spaghetti is pasta, by the way.
That's why you got us beat, though! None of us have the same opportunities you do!
Well, technically speaking, my favorite way is to do a sexy tease, but if we're talking touching, I'd have to say boobjob.
Don't worry, Aella, you'll still win against scissors!
If only your opponent was scissors instead!
Well, it makes sense. Everybody knows paper beats rock!
It's great! I like showing off my body and making people happy, so it's two birds, one stone!
Believe it or not, but I'm really into System of a Down and Slipknot... What can I say? They're great bands!
My hat's not actually candy, ~yuelia~. I just said that to be silly!
Oh yeah, pizza's the best! It has a ton of options to it too, so it's like the one food everyone likes!
You'd be surprised, Chazz. A four course Lobster Bisque dinner isn't that expensive if you make it yourself!
That's terrible, Chazz, but you also didn't answer the question. How long were you naked for, assuming you were ever punished that way at all?
Huh. So using your portals makes you hungry?
Yeah, time travel can be tricky. Sometimes everything goes right, and sometimes you end up your own grandpa!
You shouldn't, because you don't! Golly, what a weird joke to pull on someone. It's like some kind of long con, but you don't get to enjoy the result...
I am! Thank you for checking!
Okay, sure! I can give ya a couple bucks!
Now that I think about it, I should try to be a swimsuit model... I wonder if Clowning Weekly has any plans for a beach issue...?
Now that I think about it, I should try to be a swimsuit model... I can't imagine there are a lot of clown swimsuit models out there... Probably not a lot of demand for them, either...
Huh, I'm surprised the smoke from my magic trick didn't trip the sprinklers...
Don't worry, I kept the banana in a separate cooling pouch. It's still perfectly good!
Don't worry, I kept the banana in a separate cooling pouch. It's still perfectly good!... My crotch is real cold, though...
Okay, I think that's enough hand-throwing from me.
There we go, now I've caught up. That's all you get for free, though!
That's enough clowning around, I think! Time to go back to playing normally!
Man, you guys must not be very good if I'm in the lead. Don't worry, I can fix that!
I really shouldn't be the one winning, but here we are! Don't worry, I have a plan B!
Look at me, being the white clown when I'm usually the red clown! I think it's time to crank up the redness!
Golly, this game sure is taking a while. Good thing my schedule is clear... I think...
Golly, this game sure is taking a while. Good thing I got nothing going on today!
Long game, huh? Good thing I get paid by the hour...
It's just us now. No pressure!
Just us now. You wouldn't wanna be beat by a clown, would ya?
Just us now. Winning would be nice, but I wouldn't mind losing either!
Two remain! Don't blow it, now!
It's just you, me, and the banana now!
Only us now. You wouldn't wanna be beaten by a bottomless clown, now, would ya?
This is it, just us. Lose now, and you'll never live it down!
It's down to us now. You'd better win! It's hard to live down losing a game of strip poker to a naked clown!
It's down to just us. You wouldn't wanna lose to a clown in her underwear, now, would ya?
So yeah, I'm a clown, magician, and "stripper." I like to travel around and put on all kinds of shows for all kinds of audiences!
So yeah, I travel around a lot, doing lots of entertaining. Clowning for kids, burlesque for adults, and magic for all ages!
So yeah, I travel around a lot, putting on all kinds of shows, from magic to burlesque. And no, the traveling isn't just 'cause towns are inclined to chase naked clowns away!
Fun fact: My great-great-great-great-great-grandfather was Joseph Grimaldi, father of modern clown trends! He's my inspiration!
